pageContext.claim: “So the percentage of veterans reporting that they trust the VA and the VA services is now the highest in the history of the service. Satisfaction with the VA outpatient care has reached 89 percent, and we're not going to rest until we have it at 100 percent, Robert.”
pageContext.analysis: The 2018 Survey of Veteran Enrollees’ Health and Use of Healthcare found 72.7 percent of people surveyed "strongly agree" or "somewhat agree" that they have trust in the VA.
